mapper.sql: id, title, content, type, sender, recipient, status, importance, permission, create_time, send_time, read_time, expire_time, extra_data
mapper.update: UPDATE t_notification SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, type = #{type}, sender = #{sender}, recipient = #{recipient}, status = #{status}, importance = #{importance}, permission = #{permission}, create_time = #{createTime}, send_time = #{sendTime}, read_time = #{readTime}, expire_time = #{expireTime}, extra_data = #{extraData} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM t_notification WHERE recipient = #{recipient} ORDER BY create_time DESC
